title: Inaugurate Advisors
introduction: The inaugurate advisors for our programme are coming from the most famous universities in the world. They had been department heads, faculty deans, or even presidents in their universities. On the one hand, they are at the frontier of academic research; on the other hand, they are well acquainted with university education and administration such as admission. They are also committed to cultivating outstanding young people from all over the world, and their valuable contributions laid the foundation for the development of our programme.
remark: *We are deeply saddened to learn that Prof. J. H. Coates, passed away in May 2022. He will always be remembered for his great contributions to our programme.
